title: Global leading kiwi producing countries 2017
yAxis: Production volume in thousand metric tons
summary: The united is a major producer of soybeans worldwide , with china importing the largest amount of u.s. grown soybeans of any country as of 2017 . In that year , china imported nearly 32 million metric tons of soybeans from the united . Soy foods Soybeans are naturally high in protein and hence a popular ingredient in vegetarian and vegan cuisine .
gold: This statistic depicts the production volume of kiwis worldwide in 2017 , by leading country . According to the source , China was the main kiwi producer worldwide in 2017 , with production volume of some 2.02 million metric tons .
